Nerangs.ab: barsom az māhrōy ul stānišn az zōtgāh sē gām pad kustag ī frabardārān frāz nihišn mat̰ vā̊. gām-ē abar kunišn namāz ō ī zōhr barišn padāiš yā gām-ē abar kunišn namāz ō ī zōhr barišn frasrūtā īžaiiā̊ gām-ē abar kunišn namāz ō ī zōhr barišn be ō ī gāh ī ābardān šawišn ud bē gōwišn pairi.jasāi.

"He has to take the barsom from the māhrōy and make three steps from the zōtgāh at the side of the frabardārān. At mat̰ vā̊, he has to advance one step and bring namāz to the zōhr. At padāiš yā, he has to advance one step and bring namāz to the zōhr. At frasrūtā īžaiiā̊, he has to advance one step and bring namāz to the zōhr, has to go to the place of the ābardān and recite pairi.jasāi."
